column5: Hey guys..  Im trying to get out tomorrow morning in the waders to hook on some salmon... but I need Bait!!!!  Does anyone know where I can get Bait late night or as early as 7AM? Im looking for Roe or Worms!   Im located on the east side... in pickering. but im willing to travel to grab some... Ill be going east towards lindsay area for the fish... so yea!  Any help is appreciated!! THANKS!!  Pachone

Just take a flashlight out tonight and check around the grass in your yard or a nearby park. The worms come right out onto the ground. The light and your footsteps will spook them back into their holes so move quickly. Good luck!
Lucky tackle at Sheppard and Midland in scarborough is open 24/7
they aren't opened 24/7 anymore since the last time i checked (2-3 weeks ago). im not too sure about weekends though.
Marshmallows are available at every convenience store
